import React from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import data from '../../LocalJSON/Users.json' import '../../CSS/Message.css' const Message = () => { const { id } = useParams() const detailData = data && data.find(something => something.id == id) console.log(detailData) return (

<

{detailData.name}
{

{detailData.name}

{detailData.message[0].msg}

}
) } export default Message
